name: It's Tanks!
description:
Bored of playing yet another multiplayer word game? Why not blow stuff up instead? Battle in online & local turn based versus matches. Destroy tanks and terrain with a variety of weapons & items.

It’s Tanks! continues in the tradition of tank versus tank games of the ‘80s & ‘90s such as the early ‘90s classic Scorched Earth. Compete against friends and strangers in online matches via Game Center to win coins to buy weapons, items, and upgrades. Pass & Play allows you to enjoy It’s Tanks on a single device, play the person next to you or just practice. With fully destructible randomly generated levels, upgradeable weapons and a variety of special items, It’s Tanks! is for those who prefer the boom of artillery to the click of lettered tiles.

Taking a turn in It’s Tanks! is quick and simple using Angry Birds like controls to fire, making it easy to play on the go. The free version allows you to start up to 10 games at once, so you don’t have to wait for your opponent to take their turn, you can just start another game. Use the replay feature to share your favourite shots via email, Twitter, Facebook and YouTube using the integrated Everyplay support.

*** FEATURES ***
- Free To Play
- Simple Angry Birds like controls
- 10 multi-stage upgradeable weapons
- 11 special items
- Online asynchronous turn based multiplayer via Game Center
- Single device Pass & Play multiplayer
- Fully destructible randomly generated levels
- Varying wind conditions to make matches more challenging
- 15 Game Center Achievements
- Everyplay video sharing
